meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a juncture.
meanings.sent1: The juncutural decision had to be made quickly.
meanings.sent2: The juncutural meeting brought all the team members together.
meanings.sent3: The juncutural mix-up of the seating plan led to some funny moments.
meanings.sent4: The juncutural timing of the announcement caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The juncutural intersection of their paths changed their lives forever.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or occurring at a point of juncture.
